id.description: The unique identifier of the telephony trunk

name.description: The name of the telephony trunk

division.description: Information about the division associated with the trunk

id.description: The unique identifier of the division

selfUri.description: The URI to access the division details

descriptions.description: Additional descriptions or notes related to the trunk

version.description: The version of the telephony trunk

dateCreated.description: The timestamp when the trunk was created

dateModified.description: The timestamp when the trunk was last modified

modifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the telephony trunk

createdBy.description: The user who created the telephony trunk

state.description: The current state of the telephony trunk

modifiedByApp.description: The application through which the trunk was last modified

createdByApp.description: The application through which the trunk was created

edge.description: Information about the edge associated with the trunk

id.description: The unique identifier of the edge

selfUri.description: The URI to access the edge details

trunkBase.description: Information about the trunk base associated with the trunk

id.description: The unique identifier of the trunk base

name.description: The name of the trunk base

selfUri.description: The URI to access the trunk base details

trunkMetabase.description: Information about the trunk metabase associated with the trunk

id.description: The unique identifier of the trunk metabase

name.description: The name of the trunk metabase

selfUri.description: The URI to access the trunk metabase details

edgeGroup.description: Information about the edge group associated with the trunk

id.description: The unique identifier of the edge group

name.description: The name of the edge group

selfUri.description: The URI to access the edge group details

inService.description: Indicates if the trunk is currently in service

enabled.description: Indicates if the trunk is currently enabled

logicalInterface.description: Information about the logical interface associated with the trunk

id.description: The unique identifier of the logical interface

name.description: The name of the logical interface

selfUri.description: The URI to access the logical interface details

connectedStatus.description: Information about the connection status of the telephony trunk

connected.description: Indicates if the trunk is currently connected

connectedStateTime.description: The timestamp when the trunk's connection state was last updated

optionsEnabledStatus.description: Status of options enabled for the trunk

registersEnabledStatus.description: Status of registers enabled for the trunk

family.description: The family or type of the telephony trunk

proxyAddressList.description: List of proxy addresses associated with the trunk

selfUri.description: The URI to access the telephony trunk details
